name: Create or Destroy Water
description: You create or destroy water. Create Water: create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in containers or as rain in a 30-foot Cube that extinguishes exposed flames. Destroy Water: destroy up to 10 gallons of water in containers or disperse fog in a 30-foot Cube within range.
higherLevels: You create or destroy 10 additional gallons of water, or the size of the Cube increases by 5 feet, for each spell slot level above 1.

components.materialDescription: a mix of water and sand

scaling.customFormula: +10 gallons created or destroyed, or +5-foot Cube size per slot level above 1 (choose when casting).

effects.description: Choose to create clean water (in containers or as rain that can extinguish exposed flames) or destroy contained water/fog within a 30-foot Cube.
